definition: to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Sometimes, such expressions can be rewritten by replacing the division by a multiplication.
sentences.chinese: 在有些情况下，除法表达式可以用乘法表达是来重写。

sentences.english: I can do division, right? Whoa. Right?
sentences.chinese: 我也可以做除法对不对？

sentences.english: The answer to a division problem is the quotient.
sentences.chinese: 对于除法问题的答案叫做商数。

sentences.english: It's really the multiplication and in this case, division that the problem arises. Yeah?
sentences.chinese: 这里实际上是乘法和，除法引起了那个问题，请说？

sentences.english: This paper gives out the example of division block application. It possesses definit…
sentences.chinese: 对除法运算功能块运用给出了应用实例。

sentences.english: The pupil could add and subtract but hadn't learned to divide.
sentences.chinese: 这名小学生能做加法和减法，但还没学会做除法。

sentences.english: Viability was greater than 98%, as determined by trypan blue dye exclusion.
sentences.chinese: 活性大于98%，这个由锥虫蓝染料排除法来决定。

sentences.english: Similarly, you can do the quotient rule just for practice.
sentences.chinese: 同理，大家可以练习做一下除法法则。

sentences.english: Biopsy and exclusive methods combining closely follow-up were used for diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 病检或排除法结合随访可诊断。

sentences.english: An analogue divider with digitized output based on dual-slope integration is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种采用双积分原理的数显模拟除法器。

sentences.english: A test apparatus, based on the principle of liquid liquid displacement porometry was established for determining pore size distribution of inorganic membranes.
sentences.chinese: 利用液体排除法实验测定了多孔陶瓷膜的孔径分布。

sentences.english: You can put in a simple division equation into the Angle box.
sentences.chinese: 你可以把一个简单的除法算式到角框。

sentences.english: In a division operation, the number or quantity by which the dividend is divided.
sentences.chinese: 在除法运算中，去除被除数的那个数或量。

sentences.english: Doctors used deduction to diagnose the cause of the woman’s symptoms, and she survived, he said.
sentences.chinese: 医生用排除法来诊断这个女人的症状而最后治愈了。

sentences.english: Also, even for integers, some chips have hardware multiply but lack hardware divide.
sentences.chinese: 但即使是整型，有的芯片拥有硬件乘法，却缺少除法。

definition: to square a number/to calculate the square
rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
rational number (i.e. fraction of two integers, math.)
reduced fraction (e.g. one half for three sixths)/to reduce a fraction by canceling common factors in the numerator and denominator
